data_table.description: Lipid Lab, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: LIPC1A
variable.description: Cholesterol (value in mg/dL). Q1a [Lipid Lab, exam 3]

variable.name: LIPC2A
variable.description: Triglyceride (value in mg/dL). Q2a [Lipid Lab, exam 3]

variable.name: LIPC3A
variable.description: HDL cholesterol (value in mg/dL) Q3a [Lipid Lab, exam 3]

variable.name: LIPC4A
variable.description: Glucose (value in mg/dL) Q4a [Lipid Lab, exam 3]

variable.name: LIPC5
variable.description: LDL cholesterol (value in mg/dL) Q5 [Lipid Lab, exam 3]

variable.name: LIPCFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [lipid data, laboratory measurements] [Lipid Lab, exam 3]
